name: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
use_case: Comprehensive data protection framework governing the processing of personal data of individuals in the EU.
data_summary: Requires lawful bases, data minimization, purpose limitation, and safeguards for cross-border data transfers.
monitoring: Mandates ongoing compliance monitoring, breach detection, and reporting to supervisory authorities.
emergency_plan: Requires notification of personal data breaches within 72 hours and communication to affected data subjects when high risk exists.
obligations: Appoint data protection officers where required and maintain accountability measures.
Implement appropriate technical and organizational measures for data security.
Honor data subject rights including access, erasure, and portability.
penalties: Administrative fines up to EUR 20 million or 4% of global annual turnover, whichever is higher.
